name: Definitions
text:
[§88E-1]  Definitions.  As used in this chapter, unless the context clearly indicates otherwise:
     "County" means the counties of Hawaii, Kauai and Maui, and the city and county of Honolulu.
     "Employee" means a person who is eligible to participate in the employees' retirement system of the State of Hawaii as defined in section 88-21.
     "State" means the State of Hawaii. [L Sp 1981 1st, c 7, pt of §1]
 
Revision Note
 
  Numeric designations deleted and definitions rearranged.
